author: danderson
msg: Update the index page to announce 1.3.1.

author: dlr
msg: Fix issue #2488, mis-reporting of failed repository creation
(e.g. because the path to svnadmin is invalid), which was often
IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory:
(SVNRepositoryCreateFailure): New exception raised if we're unable
